ThingDef.label: Basic Temperature Control Augment [TCA]
ThingDef.description: A basic Temperature Control Augment (or just TCA). This augment uses cooling and heating systems to regulate and keep the wearer within temperature ranges where the egg-whites won’t start decaying. This is only the basic version of it and isn’t very powerful, but it may just be enough to keep the pawn from overheating or freezing.
